attributes.action: prevent the Holocaust and other historical events disappearing from the schools' curriculum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
There is no evidence to suggest that the Holocaust is disappearing from the curriculum.

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/theholocaust
